title: Research on the Relationship Between Teaching Presence and Academic Achievement in Online Learning Environments: A Project-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. A social sector job competency enhancement program for professionals in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can specifically identify three sub-elements (instructional design, interaction facilitation, direct instruction) for evaluating instructor presence in online environments
Learners can analyze the impact of instructor feedback types on academic achievement using a three-level scale during project execution
Learners can apply two instructor presence enhancement strategies to PBL activities using only mobile devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
